issue.title: [Format] Initial arrow-internal specification of compute IR
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14062](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14062). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This JIRA tracks the initial specification of Arrow's internal compute IR.

The discussion has taken place in the open, mostly in this google doc: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1C_XVOG7iFkl6cgWWMyzUoIjfKt-X2UxqagPJrla0bAE/edit#heading=h.ie0ne0gm762l.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14062?focusedCommentId=17418315) by Phillip Cloud (cpcloud):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10934
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10934>
